# The `PossiblyExactOperator` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A udiv or sdiv instruction, which can be marked as &quot;exact&quot;, indicating that no bits are destroyed. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::PossiblyExactOperator</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

A udiv or sdiv instruction, which can be marked as &quot;exact&quot;, indicating that no bits are destroyed.

Definition at line 155 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/operator-h">Operator.h</a>.
